Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — Visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [237]
Sudan | Sudan — All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [242]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [243] [244] [245] [246] [247] [248]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan — Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [249]
Palestine | Palestine — Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [254] [255]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [260]
Yemen | Yemen — Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden . [265]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [276]

请求Belgium成功
Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [247]
Sudan | Sudan — All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [252]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [253] [254] [255] [256] [257] [258]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan — Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [259]
Palestine | Palestine — Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [264] [265]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [270]
Yemen | Yemen — Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden . [275]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [286]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [243]
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 3 months. [250]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for all of Arunachal Pradesh , Manipur , Mizoram and parts of Himachal Pradesh , Jammu and Kashmir and Uttarakhand . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and Lakshadweep and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [210]

India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for all of Arunachal Pradesh , Manipur , Mizoram and parts of Himachal Pradesh , Jammu and Kashmir and Uttarakhand . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and Lakshadweep and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. 请求Cyprus成功
Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [230]
Sudan | Sudan — All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [235]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [236] [237] [238] [239] [240] [241]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan — Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [242]
Palestine | Palestine — Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [247] [248]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [253]
Yemen | Yemen — Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden . [258]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [269]
Azerbaijan | Azerbaijan : Azerbaijan refuses entry to citizens of the Republic of Cyprus with Armenian descent. This restriction applies to all countries. [318] It also strictly refuses entry to foreigners in general whose passport shows evidence of entry into the self-proclaimed Nagorno-Karabakh Republic , declaring them a so-called personae non gratae . [319]

Fetching data for Denmark...
请求Denmark成功
Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [237]
Sudan | Sudan — All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [242]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [243] [244] [245] [246] [247] [248]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan — Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [249]
Palestine | Palestine — Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [254] [255]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [260]
Yemen | Yemen — Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden . [265]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [276]

请求Estonia成功
Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [239]
Sudan | Sudan — All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [244]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [245] [246] [247] [248] [249] [250]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan — Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [251]
Palestine | Palestine — Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [256] [257]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [262]
Yemen | Yemen — Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden . [266]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [277]

请求Finland成功
Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [238]
Sudan | Sudan — All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [243]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [244] [245] [246] [247] [248] [249]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan — Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [250]
Palestine | Palestine — Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [255] [256]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [261]
Yemen | Yemen — Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden . [266]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [277]

Fetching data for Greece...
请求Greece成功
Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [234]
Sudan | Sudan — All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [239]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [240] [241] [242] [243] [244] [245]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan — Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [246]
Palestine | Palestine — Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [251] [252]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [257]
Yemen | Yemen — Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden . [262]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [273]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [228]
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [234]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for all of Arunachal Pradesh , Manipur , Mizoram and parts of Himachal Pradesh , Jammu and Kashmir and Uttarakhand . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and Lakshadweep and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [241]
Sudan | Sudan — All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [246]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [247] [248] [249] [250] [251] [252]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan — Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [254]
Palestine | Palestine — Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [259] [260]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [265]
Yemen | Yemen — Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden . [270]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [281]

Fetching data for Latvia...
请求Latvia成功
Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [241]
Sudan | Sudan — All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [246]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [247] [248] [249] [250] [251] [252]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan — Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [253]
Palestine | Palestine — Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [258] [259]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [264]
Yemen | Yemen — Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden . [268]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [279]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [293]

India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for all of Arunachal Pradesh , Manipur , Mizoram and parts of Himachal Pradesh , Jammu and Kashmir and Uttarakhand . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and Lakshadweep and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. 请求Malta成功
Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [235]
Sudan | Sudan — All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [240]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [241] [242] [243] [244] [245] [246]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan — Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [247]
Palestine | Palestine — Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [252] [253]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [258]
Yemen | Yemen — Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden . [263]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [274]

请求Netherlands成功
Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [240]
Sudan | Sudan — All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [245]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [246] [247] [248] [249] [250] [251]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan — Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [252]
Palestine | Palestine — Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [257] [258]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [263]
Yemen | Yemen — Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden . [268]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [279]

Azerbaijan | Azerbaijan : As a result of the Nagorno-Karabakh War between Azerbaijan and Armenia , Azerbaijan refuses entry to passport-holders of the Russian Federation and any other country of Armenian descent. [347] It also strictly refuses entry to foreigners in general whose passport shows evidence of entry into the self-proclaimed Nagorno-Karabakh Republic , declaring them a so-called personae non gratae . Fetching data for Slovakia...
请求Slovakia成功
Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [239]
Sudan | Sudan — All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [244]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [245] [246] [247] [248] [249] [250]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan — Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [252]
Palestine | Palestine — Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [257] [258]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [263]
Yemen | Yemen — Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden . [268]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [279]

Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [238]
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [245]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [246] [247] [248] [249] [250] [251]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [260]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [267]

Fetching data for Tanzania...
请求Tanzania成功
正在处理第 1 个表格...
Algeria | Visa required before arrival.Apply through the Algerian embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Angola | Visa required before arrival except for certain personnel of oil companies established in Angola.Apply through the Angolan embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Benin | Visa required before arrival.
Botswana | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 90 days.
Burkina Faso | Visa required before arrival.
Burundi | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 30 days.
Cameroon | Visa required before arrival except that a visa is issued on arrival to those holding a prior approval from Le Delegue General de L'Immigration.
Cape Verde | Visa issued on arrival.
Central African Republic | Visa required before arrival.
Chad | Visa required before arrival.
Comoros | Visa issued on arrival.
Congo | Visa required before arrival except for holders of a V.I.P. invitation letter.Apply through the Congolese embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Democratic Republic of the Congo | Visa issued on arrival for a maximum stay of 7 days.
Djibouti | Visa issued on arrival.
Egypt | Visa required before arrival except for wives of Egyptian nationals, children born to an Egyptian father, or children born after 25 June 2004 to an Egyptian mother.Apply through the Egyptian embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Equatorial Guinea | Visa required before arrival.
Eritrea | Visa required before arrival, except that a holder of a confirmation of a pre-arranged visa may be issued the visa on arrival if the Eritrean sponsor submits the request to the Immigration Authority at least 48 hours before arrival.
Ethiopia | Visa issued on arrival only for certain official visits.
Gabon | Visa required before arrival except that a visa may be given upon arrival to a holder of an entry authorisation issued by immigration before arrival.
Gambia | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 90 days.
Ghana | Visa issued on arrival. Also per the cited source, "Holders of an Emergency Visa on arrival Letter issued by Ghana Immigrations Service can obtain a visa on arrival, provided an approval has been obtained from the Immigration authorities at Accra (ACC) and an OK TO BOARD message is inserted in passenger's reservation."
Guinea | No visa is required.
Guinea-Bissau | Visa issued on arrival for a maximum stay of 90 days.
Ivory Coast | Visa required before arrival except that: (1) a holder of a printed "Approved pre-enrolment" and a Registration Receipt, obtained via, can obtain a visa on arrival at Abidjan (ABJ); or (2) a holder of an invitation letter issued by the authorities of Cote d'Ivoire prior to travel can obtain a visa on arrival.
Kenya | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 3 months.
Lesotho | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 90 days.
Liberia | Visa issued on arrival if it has been pre-arranged and paid for by a local sponsor in Liberia.Liberia does not have a diplomatic mission in Tanzania.
Libya | Visa required before arrival except that a visa may be issued on arrival to a holder of a copy of a letter issued by the Libyan immigration authorities confirming that a visa will be granted on arrival at the airport.Apply through the Libyan embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Madagascar | Visa issued on arrival for a maximum stay of 90 days.
Malawi | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 90 days.
Mali | Visa issued on arrival.
Mauritania | Visa issued on arrival at Nouakchott.
Mauritius | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 90 days.
Mayotte | Visa required before arrival.
Morocco | Visa required before arrival.
Mozambique | No visa is required.
Namibia | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 3 months.
Niger | Visa required before arrival.
Nigeria | Visa required before arrival except for certain holders of written e-visas.Apply through the Nigerian embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Rwanda | Visa is issued on arrival free of charge for 6 months (renewable).
São Tomé and Príncipe | Visa required before arrival except that, "E-Visas can be applied for, prior to departure, at. Printed Visa authorization must be presented at the time of travel."
Senegal | Visa required before arrival except that a holder of a pre-enrollment can obtain a visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 3 months at Dakar (DKR).Apply at the Senegalese embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Seychelles | Visa required before arrival except that a visitor's permit may instead be obtained on arrival, which initially allows a maximum stay of 3 months.The Seychelles has a consulate in Dar es Salaam.
Sierra Leone | Visa required before arrival except that a visa is issued upon arrival to those who have pre-arranged a visa.
Somalia | Visa required before arrival except that a visa on arrival may be issued for a maximum stay of 30 days if an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival.
South Africa | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 90 days per calendar year.
South Sudan | Visa issued on arrival.
Sudan | Visa required before arrival except that a holder of an "Entry Permit" issued by the Sudanese Ministry of interior can obtain a visa on arrival, for a maximum stay of 60 days.Apply through the Sudanese embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Eswatini | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 30 days
Togo | Visa required before arrival except that a 7-day visa may be requested upon arrival.
Tunisia | Visa required before arrival.
Uganda | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 3 months.
Zambia | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 90 days for tourists and 30 days for persons traveling on business.
Zimbabwe | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 3 months.
正在处理第 2 个表格...
Anguilla | Visa required before arrival except for a holder of a visa issued by the United Kingdom.
Antigua and Barbuda | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 1 month.
Argentina | Visa required before arrival.
Aruba | Visa required before arrival except for a maximum stay of 30 days for a holder of a valid multiple entry C visa issued by a Schengen member state.
Bahamas | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 3 months.
Barbados | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 6 months.
Belize | No visa is required.
Bermuda | Visa required before arrival except for a maximum stay of 3 months by a person who holds a multiple-entry visa issued by Canada, the United States, or the United Kingdom that is valid for at least 45 days beyond the period of intended stay in Bermuda.
British Virgin Islands | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 30 days.
Bolivia | 90-day visa issued upon arrival for US$52.
Bonaire | Visa required before arrival except for a holder of: (1) a valid "D" visa issued by a Schengen member state; or (2) a multiple-entry "C" visa issued by a Schengen member state for a maximum stay of 30 days.
Brazil | Visa required before arrival.Apply through the Brazilian embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Canada | Visa required before arrival.Apply through the Canadian embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Cayman Islands | No visa is required of tourists for a maximum stay of 60 days or of business people for a maximum stay of 10 days.
Chile | Visa required before arrival.
Colombia | Visa required before arrival except that an e-visa may be applied for at.
Costa Rica | Visa required before arrival except that a person may stay for a maximum of 30 days without a visa if the person holds: (1) a multiple-entry business or tourist visa issued by Canada, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, Switzerland, or a European Union member state; (2) a multiple-entry business or tourist visa issued by Japan, provided the visa has been used and is valid for at least 6 months beyond the date of arrival; (3) a multiple-entry B1, B2, or D visa issued by the United States, provided it is valid for the period of the intended stay; or (4) another kind of visa issued by the United States, provided it is valid for at least 6 months from the date of arrival.
Cuba | "Visa required passengers traveling as tourists must obtain a Tourist (visa) Card (Tarjeta de Turista) prior to arrival at: a. Cuban Embassies or Consulates; b. travel agencies or authorized airlines."Cuba has an embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Curaçao | Visa required before arrival except for a holder of: (1) a valid "D" visa issued by a Schengen member state; or (2) a multiple-entry "C" visa issued by a Schengen member state for a maximum stay of 30 days.
Dominica | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 6 months.
Dominican Republic | Visa required before arrival except that a holder of a valid visa issued by the United States, Canada, or a European Union member state may stay for a maximum of 90 days without a visa when traveling as a tourist.
Ecuador | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 90 days.
El Salvador | No visa is required for a person holding a valid visa issued by the United States, Canada, or a Schengen member state.
French Guiana | Visa required before arrival. A Schengen visa is valid for French Guiana provided the visa is endorsed "also valid for French Guiana".
Grenada | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 3 months.
Guadeloupe | Visa required before arrival. A Schengen visa is valid for Guadeloupe provided the visa is endorsed "also valid for French West Indies".
Guatemala | Visa required before arrival except that a person holding a valid visa issued by the United States, Canada, or a Schengen member state may stay for a maximum of 90 days.
Guyana | Visa required. A person traveling as a tourist may obtain a visa upon arrival for a maximum stay of 30 days if the person holds: (1) a letter of invitation from a sponsor or host; (2) the contact details of the sponsor, host, or hotel; and (3) two passport photos.
Haiti | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 3 months.
Honduras | Visa required before arrival except for those holding a valid visa issued by the United States, Canada, or a Schengen member state.
Jamaica | No visa is required.
Martinique | 
Mexico | Visa required before arrival except that a person holding a valid visa issued by the United States may stay for a maximum of 180 days.
Montserrat | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 6 months.
Nicaragua | No visa is required for a person holding a visa issued by the United States, Canada, or a Schengen member state. Otherwise, a visa for a maximum stay of 90 days is issued on arrival for US$20.
Panama | No visa required for a maximum stay of 30 days for tourists holding a multiple entry visa issued by Andorra, Australia, Canada, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Monaco, Norway, San Marino, Switzerland, the United States, or a European Union member state, provided that the visa has been used and is valid for at least two more entries.
Paraguay | Visa required before arrival.
Peru | Visa required before arrival.
Puerto Rico | Visa required before arrival except for those arriving directly from the United States.Apply through the United States embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Saint Kitts and Nevis | Visa is required before arrival. An eVisa can be applied for before arrival at.
Saint Lucia | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 6 weeks.
Saint Martin | Visa required before arrival except that a visa issued by a Schengen member state is acceptable if endorsed "also valid for French West Indies".
Sint Maarten | Visa required before arrival except for: (1) a holder of a valid "D" visa issued by a Schengen member state; (2) a holder of a multiple-entry "C" visa issued by a Schengen member state for a maximum stay of 30 days; or (3) a person transiting overland to the French part of St. Martin within 48 hours.
Saint Vincent and the Grenadines | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 1 month.
Suriname | Visa required before arrival except that a visa is issued upon arrival for a maximum stay of two months to those arriving from a country without Suriname representation and holding pre-arranged approval.
Trinidad and Tobago | Visa required before arrival except that this requirement is waived for those having pe-arranged approval from immigration.
Turks and Caicos Islands | Visa required as of 1 April 2015.
United States | Visa required before arrival.Apply through the United States embassy in Dar es Salaam.
United States Virgin Islands | Visa required before arrival except for those arriving directly from the United States.Apply through the United States embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Uruguay | Visa required before arrival.
Venezuela | Visa required before arrival.
正在处理第 3 个表格...
Afghanistan | Visa required before arrival.
Armenia | Visa required before arrival.
Azerbaijan | Visa required before arrival except that a visa is issued on arrival to those holding an official invitation letter from an Azerbaijan government authority.
Bahrain | Visa required before arrival.
Bangladesh | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 90 days.
Bhutan | Visa required before arrival except that a tourist visa may be provided on arrival by the Department of Tourism if the visa application is sent by the tour operator at least 2.5 months in advance.
Brunei | Visa required before arrival.
Cambodia | Visa issued on arrival for a maximum stay of 30 days. An e-visa can be applied for at.
China | Visa required in advance except for certain tourists travelling in a group organized by a Chinese international tour operator or registered travel agency for a maximum 6-day stay. A prearranged visa may be issued on arrival only in limited circumstances.Apply through the Chinese embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Cyprus | Visa required except for a holder of: (1) a double or multiple entry C visa issued by a Schengen member state; or (2) a double or multiple entry short stay visa issued by Bulgaria, Romania, or Croatia. The maximum allowed stay is equal to the period that visa is valid, not to exceed 90 days.
Hong Kong | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 90 days.
India | e-Tourist Visa for up to 30 days.
Indonesia | No visa is required for a maximum stay of to 30 days. Visa on arrival (for up to 60 days) is also available.
Iran | Visa issued on arrival for tourism purposes for a maximum stay of 15 days .Apply through the Iranian embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Iraq | Visa required unless arriving at: (1) Baghdad, Basra, or Najaf and holding a signed and stamped letter issued by the Ministry of Interior of Iraq; or (2) arriving at Erbil or Sulaymaniyah and holding a letter issued by the Ministry of Interior of the Kurdistan Regional Government.
Israel | Visa required before arrival except that a visa is issued on arrival for groups of 10 or more passengers holding confirmation from the Ministry of Interior.
Japan | Visa required before arrival.Apply through the Japanese embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Jordan | Visa required before arrival except that a visa is issued on arrival for persons attending a scientific or economical conference and holding a security approval.
Kazakhstan | Visa required before arrival, except that a person holding a letter of invitation may be issued a visa for a maximum stay of 1 month upon arrival at the Aktau, Almaty, Astana, Atyrau, or Uralsk airport if the visa has been pre-arranged by The Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
Kuwait | Visa required before arrival, except that a holder of a confirmation from the transporting carrier that a tourist visa is available on arrival may obtain the visa then for a maximum stay of 1 month if the traveler has a sponsor in Kuwait who holds the original visa.
Kyrgyzstan | Visa required before arrival.
Laos | Visa required before arrival except that a visa allowing a maximum stay of 30 days is issued on arrival at Vientiane International, Luang Prabang, or Pakse airport.
Lebanon | Visa required before arrival. In addition to a visa, an approval should be obtained from the Immigration department of the General Directorate for General Secutiy (La Surete Generale).
Macau | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 90 days.
Malaysia | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 30 days.
Maldives | Visa issued on arrival for a maximum stay of 30 days.
Mongolia | Visa required before arrival except that a visa is issued on arrival to a holder of confirmation of a pre-arranged visa, provided the person is arriving from a country where there is no diplomatic representation of Mongolia and a sponsor in Mongolia submits a request to the Mongolian Immigration Authority.
Myanmar | Visa required before arrival, with a maximum allowed stay of 28 days.
Nepal | Tourist visa issued on arrival for a maximum stay of 90 days. Business visa issued on arrival for a maximum stay of 5 years for those holding a license issued by the Ministry of Industry.
North Korea | Visa required before arrival.
Oman | Visa required before arrival.
Pakistan | Visa required before arrival.Apply through the Pakistani embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Papua New Guinea | Visa required before arrival.
Philippines | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 30 days; otherwise, a visa is issued on arrival for a maximum stay of 59 days.
Qatar | Visa required before arrival.
Saudi Arabia | Visa required before arrival.Apply through the Saudi Arabian embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Singapore | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 30 days.
South Korea | Visa required before arrival, except that no visa is needed for a holder of a visa issued by Australia, Canada, Japan, New Zealand, or the United States for a maximum stay of 30 days if the holder: (1) arrives from a third country and departs to the country that issued the visa; or (2) arrives on a direct flight from the country that issued the visa and departs to a third country.Apply through the South Korean embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Sri Lanka | Visa required before arrival, except that no visa is required for a person who holds an Electronic Travel Authorization (ETA) for a maximum stay of 30 days. A tourist ETA may be obtained before or upon arrival at.
Syria | Visa required except for persons born in certain countries in northern Africa and the Middle East. Any required visa may be obtained on arrival if the visa is pre-arranged by a sponsor in Syria and certain procedures are followed.
Taiwan | Visa required before arrival, except that no visa is required for a maximum stay of 30 days if the person holds a Business and Academic Travel Card issued by Taiwan.
Tajikistan | Visa required before arrival.
Thailand | Visa required before arrival.
Timor-Leste | Single entry visa issued on arrival for a maximum stay of 30 days. Multiple entry visa issued on arrival for a maximum stay of between 30 and 90 days if the person holds a Visa Application Authorization issued by the Immigration Department.
Turkmenistan | Visa required before arrival, except that the holder of a letter of invitation issued by a company registered in Turkmenistan and approved by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs may obtain a visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 10 days.
United Arab Emirates | Visa required before arrival, except that: (1) a 96-hour transit visa may be issued on arrival if the transit time is at least 8 hours, the traveler holds an onward ticket to a third country, and the person has a transit package including hotel accommodation and airport transfer; or (2) a 96-hour, 14-day, or 30-day visa may be issued on arrival to a person who has a pre-arranged visa that has been deposited by the sponsor with the Immigration Authorities and who is met by the sponsor on arrival.
Uzbekistan | Visa required before arrival, except that a visa can be obtained on arrival at Tashkent if the traveler has a Visa Confirmation (stamp) issued by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
Vietnam | Visa required before arrival, except that a visa may be issued on arrival for a maximum stay of 30 days if the traveler arrives at Phu Quoc.Apply through the Vietnamese embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Yemen | Visa required before arrival.Apply through the Yemeni embassy in Dar es Salaam.
正在处理第 4 个表格...
Albania | Visa required except for a maximum stay of 90 days by a holder of: (1) a valid multiple entry visa issued by the United States (US) that has been used to enter the US at least once; (2) a valid multiple entry visa issued by the United Kingdom (UK) that has been used to enter the UK at least once; or (3) a valid multiple entry "C" or "D" visa issued by a Schengen member state that has been used to enter the Schengen area at least once. A visa may be issued on arrival to a holder of a letter from the Ministry of Interior confirming that the visa will be available then.
Andorra | No visa required by Andorra, although a Schengen visa is required to access the country as it is landlocked between France and Spain.
Armenia | Visa required before arrival.
Austria | Visa required before arrival. Schengen country.
Belarus | Visa required before arrival except that a visa may be issued on arrival at Minsk in limited circumstances.
Belgium | Visa required before arrival. Schengen country.Apply through the Belgian embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Bosnia and Herzegovina | Visa required, except that a person arriving from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Ireland, Monaco, Romania, the United Kingdom, or a Schengen member state does not need a visa for a maximum stay of 7 days if the person holds a multiple entry visa issued by any of those countries.
Bulgaria | Visa required before arrival. Bulgaria has an embassy in Addis Ababa.
Croatia | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the Croatian embassy in Pretoria.
Czech Republic | Visa required before arrival, except that a short term visa is issued on arrival by the Authority of Aliens and Police Service to family members of E.U. nationals holding reliable proof thereof (e.g., marriage certificate). The Czech Republic's accredited representative is in Nairobi. Schengen country.
Denmark | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the Swedish embassy in Dar es Salaam. Schengen country.
Estonia | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the Finnish embassy in Dar es Salaam. Schengen country.
Finland | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the Finnish embassy in Dar es Salaam. Schengen country.
France | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the French embassy in Dar es Salaam. Schengen country.
Georgia | 3-month visa issued on arrival.
Germany | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the German embassy in Dar es Salaam. Schengen country.
Greece | Visa required before arrival. Greece's accredited representative is in Nairobi. Schengen country.
Hungary | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the Finnish embassy in Dar es Salaam. Schengen country.
Iceland | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the Swedish embassy in Dar es Salaam. Schengen country.
Ireland | Visa required before arrival. Ireland has an embassy in Dar es Salaam but apply online.
Italy | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the Italian embassy in Dar es Salaam. Schengen country.
Kosovo | visa required.
Latvia | Visa required before arrival. Latvia has an embassy in Cairo. Schengen country.
Liechtenstein | Visa required before arrival. No Liechtenstein embassies in Africa. Schengen country.
Lithuania | Visa issued on arrival for a maximum stay of 10 days to visitors provided holding proof that a visa application has been submitted: (1) by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to the State Border Guard Service; or (2) by the Ministry of Interior (Migration Dept.) to the Border Police Department of the Ministry of Internal Affairs. Schengen country.
Luxembourg | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the Belgian embassy in Dar es Salaam. Schengen country.
Macedonia | Visa required, except for a maximum single stay of 15 days, up to a maximum of 90 days within a six-month period, for holders of a valid Schengen Type "C" visa. Macedonia has an embassy in Cairo.
Malta | Visa required before arrival. Malta has an embassy in Cairo. Schengen country.
Moldova | Visa required before arrival. No Moldova embassies in Africa.
Monaco | Visa required before arrival. No Monaco embassies in Africa.
Montenegro | Visa required, except for a maximum stay of 7 days, or not longer than the expiry of the visa, if the validity of the visa is less than 7 days those irrespective of nationality, holding a visa issued by a Schengen member state or U.S.A. No Montenegro embassies in Africa, although Serbia has an embassy in Nairobi.
Netherlands | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the Dutch embasssy in Dar es Salaam. Schengen country.
Norway | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the Norwegian embassy in Dar es Salaam. Schengen country.
Poland | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the Polish embassy in Nairobi.
Portugal | Visa required before arrival. Portugal's accredited representative is in Nairobi. Schengen country.
Romania | Visa required before arrival. Romania's accredited representative is in Nairobi.
San Marino | The same regulations that apply to Italy apply to San Marino.
Serbia | Visa required before arrival. Serbia's accredited representative is in Addis Ababa.
Slovakia | Visa required before arrival. Slovakia's accredited representative is in Nairobi. Schengen country.
Slovenia | Visa required before arrival. Slovenia has an embassy in Cairo. Schengen country.
Spain | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the Spanish embassy in Dar es Salaam. Schengen country.
Sweden | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the Swedish embassy in Dar es Salaam. Schengen country.
Switzerland | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the Swiss embassy in Dar es Salaam. Schengen country.
Turkey | Visa required before arrival unless the person has a visa issued by the United States, the United Kingdom, or a Schengen member state, arrives and departs on Turkish Airlines at Istanbul, and has a hotel reservation. Apply through the Turkish embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Ukraine | Visa required before arrival. Ukraine has an embassy in Nairobi.
United Kingdom | Visa required before arrival. Apply through the British embassy in Dar es Salaam.
Vatican City | Visa required before arrival; however, Vatican City does not issue visas. Schengen country.

Cook Islands | No visa is required for recreation or holiday visitors for a maximum stay of 6 months. Extension permits available in the Cook Islands for stays over 31 days but less than 6 months.

Kiribati | Visa required before arrival.
Marshall Islands | Visa required before arrival.
Federated States of Micronesia | No visa is required for a maximum stay of 30 days if the visit is for touristic or visitors' purposes.
Nauru | Visa required before arrival.
New Caledonia | Visa required before arrival.
New Zealand | Visa required before arrival. New Zealand's accredited representative is in Harare.
Niue | Visa issued on arrival for a maximum stay of 30 days.
Northern Mariana Islands | Visa required before arrival except that person may stay for a maximum of 30 days without a visa if the person has a United States entry visa that is valid for at least 6 months from entry into the Northern Mariana Islands and allows re-entry into the United States.

请求Trinidad and Tobago成功
Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — Visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [212]
Sudan | Sudan — All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 90 days. [218]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [219] [220] [221] [222] [223] [224]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan — Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [225]
Palestine | Palestine — Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [230] [231]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [236]
Yemen | Yemen — Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden . [240]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [251]

请求United Kingdom成功
Eritrea | Eritrea (outside Asmara ) — visa covers Asmara only; to travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa ). [314]
Sudan | Sudan — All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Hong Kong | Hong Kong — Visa not required for 180 days. Prior to 1997, British citizens had the right of abode in Hong Kong. [319]
India | India — Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur , Arunachal Pradesh , Uttaranchal , Jammu and Kashmir , Rajasthan , Himachal Pradesh . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year. [320] [321] [322] [323] [324] [325]
Kazakhstan | Kazakhstan — Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast , and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty . [326]
Palestine | Palestine — Visa not required. Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed. [331] [332]
Turkmenistan | Turkmenistan — A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat , Cheleken , Dashoguz , Serakhs and Serhetabat . [337]
Yemen | Yemen — Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden . [342]
Colombia | Colombia — Visitors arriving at San Andrés and Leticia must buy tourist cards on arrival. [345]
